full_description:
LITE-ON 24X SATA Internal DVD Burner 

  • SATA Half-Height internal DVD+R / DVD+RW / DVD-R / DVD-RW / DVD+R9/ DVD-R9/ DVD-RAM/DVD-ROM / CD-R/ CD-RW / CD-ROM combination drive
  • Support Double Layer DVD+/- R9 Recording Function
  • SMART-BURN avoiding Buffer Under Run error, Automatically adjusting writing strategy & walking OPC to provide the best burning quality
  • SMART-X function adjusts CD-DA / VCD / DVD data extraction to a fastest allowable speed according to both data request rate from host and disk quality
  • ABS system reduce vibration and noise during recording and reading
  • Support Fixed Packet, Variable Packet, TAO, SAO, DAO, Random Access Write, Incremental, sequential recording, restricted overwrite, Layer Jump recording, Raw Mode Burning & Over-Burn
  • DVD read compliant: DVD single/dual layer (PTP/OTP), DVD-R(3.9GB/4.7GB), DVD-R multi-borders, DVD-RAM DVD+R, DVD+R multi-sessions, DVD-RW, and DVD+RW
  • CD read compliant: CD-DA, CD-ROM, CD-ROM/XA, Photo-CD, Multi-session, Karaoke-CD, Video-CD, CD-I FMV, CD Extra, CD Plus, CD-R, and CD-RW
  • Support both 8cm and 12cm disc of CD and DVD family
  • Conform to Orange Book: Part 2 CD-R Volume 1, Part 2 CD-R Volume 2 Multi Speed, Part 3 CD-RW Volume 1 (1x, 2x, and 4x), Part 3 CD-RW Volume2: High Speed, Part 3 CD-RW Volume 3: Ultra Speed.

Transcend TS8XDVDS-K Slim External Black DVD Writer

Transcend TS8XDVDS-K Slim External Black DVD Writer is used for thin-and-light laptops, netbooks, and Ultrabooks. This DVD Writer includes a free download of CyberLink Media Suite 10 media writing software suite. It is built with Ultra-slim, sleek design with rounded edges â€“ just 13.9mm thick. This DVD Writer is compatible with CD-R/RW, DVDÂ±R, DVDÂ±RW, DVDÂ±R DL, M-DISC, DVD-RAM media and supports TV connectivity for media playback without additional driver installation. Reads and writes Dual Layer discs ar added in this DVD writer, where Read and Write speed for DVD is 8x and Read and Write speed for CD is 24x. It also has 160ms/140ms DVD/CD ROM, max. 142.8 mm x 148.0 mm x 13.9 mm (5.62" x 5.83" x 0.55") dimension, mini USB to USB Type A interface with including CyberLink Power2Go media writing software and no external power adapter needed because USB powered already added here. This DVD Writer supports Microsoft Windows 7, Microsoft Windows 8, Microsoft Windows 10, Mac OS X 10.7 or later, Vista and XP. Here is noted that TV connectivity function does not support DVD Movie Title playback and file size over 4GB. title: Asus DRW-24B1ST Internal SATA DVD Writer
product_list_short_description: E-Green saves over 50% of power consumption
cat_seo_title: Optical Disk Drive Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Discover a wide range of Optical Disk Drive including Internal & External optical drives at best price in BD. Shop online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
product_page_short_description: E-Green saves over 50% of power consumption
full_description:
Asus DRW-24B1ST Internal SATA DVD Writer

The Asus DRW-24B1ST Internal SATA DVD Writer is a high-performance and power-saving device that allows you to store multimedia data efficiently and create a complete backup solution. With its fast 24X DVD±R writing speed, you can quickly burn your favorite music, videos, and photos onto DVDs. One of the key features of the Asus DRW-24B1ST is its E-Green technology, which automatically closes the drive application when it's not in use, saving you over 50% of power consumption. This energy-saving drive is also equipped with AVRS (Auto Vibration Reducing System) technology that minimizes vibrations during media playback, ensuring smooth and clear playback quality. This DVD writer comes with a free app that allows you to back up all of your Android devices' important data wirelessly to your PC's hard drive or SD card. Additionally, it has M-DISC support, which offers a 1000-year storage solution, allowing you to save your priceless memories or data for future generations. With the Asus DRW-24B1ST's Disc Encryption feature, you can have double security on the go by controlling access with a password and enabling the hidden-file folder function. Overall, this internal SATA DVD writer is a great option for those who need a fast, reliable, and energy-efficient device for multimedia data storage and backup.

full_description:
ASUS ZenDrive SDRW-08U9M-U External DVD Drive Gold

The ASUS ZenDrive SDRW-08U9M-U is an ultraslim external DVD drive & writer with USB Type-C and Type-A interface to support a variety of laptops including PC and Mac. The reversible Type-C for any-way-up connectivity convenience enables ultra-fast data transmission from compatible devices. It has a robust construction with a Zen-inspired concentric-circle finish. With the USB-C, ASUS ZenDrive SDRW-08U9M-U External DVD Drive is ready to plug right in. It supports M-DISC, an archival-quality storage solution designed to help users protect their most precious digital memories. M-DISC burning technology engraves recorded data into a patented rock-like layer that is resistant to extreme conditions. It features hassle-free data protection through password control and hidden folder functions (Windows OS). The ASUS ZenDrive SDRW-08U9M-U offers cross-platform support and it is compatible with Windows and Mac OS. It comes with a 1-year warranty.

product_list_short_description: DVD Read and Write Speeds: up to 8x
CD Read and Write Speeds: up to 24x
cat_seo_title: Optical Disk Drive Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Discover a wide range of Optical Disk Drive including Internal & External optical drives at best price in BD. Shop online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
product_page_short_description: DVD Read and Write Speeds: up to 8x
CD Read and Write Speeds: up to 24x
full_description:
ASUS ZenDrive V1M External DVD Writer

The ASUS ZenDrive V1M External DVD Drive and Writer with M-Disc Support is a 14.6mm external optical drive with a USB Type-C interface that is compatible with Windows and Mac. This drive has an 8x maximum DVD read and write speed and a 24x maximum CD read and write speed. This drive also supports M-DISC, an archival-quality storage solution designed to assist users in protecting their data. M-DISC technology engraves recorded data into a specific layer that is resistant to extreme temperatures. M-DISC is intended to protect your data from degradation and loss for at least 1,000 years. This optical drive comes with Cyberlink and Nero software.

Cut-Crystal Style and Storage

The ASUS ZenDrive V1M's sleek, contemporary design conceals a ton of functionality and convenience. You won't ever have to worry about forgetting or losing the 24 cm connecting cable because it is both contained and hidden by a corner cover.

M-DISC Support

ASUS ZenDrive V1M supports M-DISC, an archival-quality storage solution for safeguarding your valuable digital memories ranging from family photos to home videos and more. M-DISC-burning technology engraves recorded data into a patented rock-like layer that is resistant to extreme temperatures, allowing you to save your life's memories and critical data for up to 1,000 years.
